markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Ethereal](/Traits.aspx?ID=593)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 456 <sup>2.0</sup>

Ethereal creatures are natives of the Ethereal Plane. They can survive the basic environmental effects of the Ethereal Plane.
name: Ethereal
